.. image:: /resource/header.png

|

ðŸŒŠ Ocean is PufferLib's suite of first-party environments. They are small and can be trained from scratch in 10 seconds to 2 minutes. Use Ocean as a sanity check for your training code instead of overnighting heavier runs.

.. image:: /resource/ocean.png
